94df1df882950eced16e9d7cd15ac041.question_template: donne moi le nombre des eleves
94df1df882950eced16e9d7cd15ac041.sql_template:
SELECT 
    p.NomFr AS Nom, 
    p.PrenomFr AS Prenom, 
    e.DateNaissance, 
    c.NOMCLASSEFR AS Classe,
    pe.Type AS TypeParent,
    pe.NomFr AS NomParent,
    pe.PrenomFr AS PrenomParent,
    pe.Tel1 AS TelephoneParent
FROM 
    eleve e
JOIN 
    personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
JOIN 
    inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve
JOIN 
    classe c ON ie.Classe = c.id
JOIN 
    parenteleve pe_rel ON e.id = pe_rel.Eleve
JOIN 
    parent pa ON pe_rel.Parent = pa.id
JOIN 
    personne pe ON pa.Personne = pe.id
WHERE 
    ie.AnneeScolaire = (SELECT id FROM anneescolaire WHERE AnneeScolaire = '2023/2024')
    AND ie.Annuler = 0
ORDER BY 
    c.NOMCLASSEFR, p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr;

61c3a921ad3abea010a938846edda4e9.question_template: donne moi le nombre des inscriptions pour l'annee {AnneeScolaire}
61c3a921ad3abea010a938846edda4e9.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_inscriptions
FROM inscriptioneleve ie
JOIN anneescolaire a ON ie.AnneeScolaire = a.id
WHERE a.AnneeScolaire LIKE '%{AnneeScolaire}%' AND ie.Annuler = 0;

fc54e0ace1b2fce78174740277de6bdc.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_eleves FROM eleve e JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve WHERE ie.Annuler = 0

d0be599ead0d6236daf3f3abcf6f93eb.question_template: donne moi les retards effectué par l eleve BenAbda Malak
d0be599ead0d6236daf3f3abcf6f93eb.sql_template:
SELECT r.id, r.Date, r.Heure, r.Duree, m.NomMatiereFr AS Matiere, 
       CONCAT(p.NomFr, ' ', p.PrenomFr) AS Enseignant, r.Vu
FROM retard r
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON r.Inscription = ie.id
JOIN eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id
JOIN personne p_eleve ON e.IdPersonne = p_eleve.id
JOIN matiere m ON r.Matiere = m.id
JOIN enseingant ens ON r.Enseignant = ens.id
JOIN personne p ON ens.idPersonne = p.id
WHERE CONCAT(p_eleve.NomFr, ' ', p_eleve.PrenomFr) = 'BenAbda Malak';

a8f2db8efb48c2a54aae9217102233ec.question_template: donne moi lesnotes de la tirimestre {IDPersonne}  de  l eleve BenAbda Malak
a8f2db8efb48c2a54aae9217102233ec.sql_template:
SELECT em.libematifr AS matiere, ed.moyemati AS moyenne, ex.codeperiexam AS codeTrimestre 
FROM Edumoymaticopie ed
JOIN Edumatiere em ON ed.codemati = em.codemati
__PROTECTED_{IDPersonne}__ Eduperiexam ex ON ed.codeperiexam = ex.codeperiexam
JOIN Eleve e ON e.idedusrv = ed.idenelev
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
WHERE p.NomFr = 'BenAbda' 
AND p.PrenomFr = 'Malak'
AND ed.codeperiexam = {IDPersonne}{IDPersonne}
AND ed.moyemati != '0.00';

a9ed657d2fc26f5612b16c0caacbd82a.question_template: le nombre des eleves cette annee
a9ed657d2fc26f5612b16c0caacbd82a.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_eleves
FROM eleve e
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve
JOIN anneescolaire a ON ie.AnneeScolaire = a.id
WHERE a.AnneeScolaire = CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '/', YEAR(CURDATE())+1);

b4a718f8de4919bdc0ebaf3738ed6de8.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_classes FROM classe;

92ea498d8cde01202dfc16e3eda95194.question_template: NOMBRE d'absences pour l'elevces benabda malak
92ea498d8cde01202dfc16e3eda95194.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(a.id) AS nombre_absences
FROM absence a
JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON a.Inscription = ie.id
JOIN eleve e ON ie.Eleve = e.id
JOIN personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
WHERE CONCAT(p.NomFr, ' ', p.PrenomFr) = 'BENABDA Malak';

e0bda8197e58839fe38b56adbfec55ff.sql_template:
SELECT 
    c.id,
    c.CODECLASSEFR AS code_classe,
    c.NOMCLASSEFR AS nom_classe,
    n.NOMNIVFR AS niveau,
    s.NomSectFr AS section,
    a.AnneeScolaire AS annee_scolaire
FROM 
    classe c
JOIN 
    niveau n ON c.IDNIV = n.id
JOIN 
    section s ON c.IDSECT = s.id
JOIN 
    anneescolaire a ON c.ID_ANNEE_SCO = a.id
ORDER BY 
    c.ordre;
